WireNine has been in business since 2004. Our VPS Hosting plans include 99.9% network uptime guarantee, 24/7 technical support and 30 Day money back guarantee!

Special Offer 50% OFF first month. Use coupon "hdvps50" to sign up.

WireNine.com VPS Hosting features:

  • Fully redundant SAS 15K RAID 10 Array for FAST disk I/O
  • Premium Cisco powered network
  • Supermicro Enterprise Servers
  • Choose from CentOS, Debian, Fedora and Ubuntu
  • Optional cPanel with WHM Control Panel ($15/mo)
  • Control your VPS with Solus Virtual Manager (SolusVM)
  • 1-Click Reboots/OS Reloads FREE
  • Install and customize applications
  • FREE Migrations from cPanel to cPanel
  • Fully Managed with cPanel
  • 99.9% Network Uptime Guarantee
  • 30 Day Money Back Guarantee
  • 24/7/365 Technical Support

FAQ
Do you offer fully managed services?

All VPS packages with cPanel are fully managed, a few examples of our management services include:

- Initial Security Hardening and Optimization
- Server Updates as Requested (OS, cPanel, php, mysql)
- Troubleshooting server related errors
- DNS Troubleshooting and Configuration
- Install/setup Firewall
- Troubleshoot Load problems

Do you allow adult content?
YES, legal adult content is allowed.

Do you allow IRC or Proxy sites?
No, IRC or proxies are not allowed.

When will my VPS be setup?
All VPS servers are usually setup within the hour, but can take up to 24 hours.

Where is your datacenter located?
Los Angeles, CA is the only available location at this time.

How long have you been in business?
Since 2004

What port speeds are included with the VPS?
100Mbps
